name: tooljet
description: ToolJet is an open-source low-code platform to build internal apps using a drag-and-drop UI. It connects to databases and APIs, supports role-based access, and can be self-hosted or used as a managed cloud service.
features: Drag-and-drop builder: Create internal tools using a visual interface without writing extensive code.
Database connections: Connect to PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and other databases for data access.
API integration: Integrate with REST APIs, GraphQL endpoints, and third-party services seamlessly.
Pre-built components: Use ready-made UI components like tables, forms, charts, and buttons for rapid development.
Custom queries: Write SQL, JavaScript, or Python queries to fetch and manipulate data from connected sources.
Role-based access: Define user roles and permissions to control access to apps and data.
Workflows: Automate business processes with visual workflow builder and event triggers.
Mobile responsive: Build apps that work on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices automatically.
Version control: Track changes to applications with built-in version history and rollback capabilities.
Collaboration: Work with team members on app development with real-time collaboration features.
Self-hosted or cloud: Deploy on your infrastructure for full control or use managed cloud for convenience.
Marketplace: Access pre-built templates and plugins from the community marketplace for faster development.
